title: India refuses to sign joint statement at defence summit over Kashmir
description: India has said that its concerns about terrorism were not adequately reflected in the document.
content: India has refused to sign a joint statement at the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) summit in China as it did not reflect the country's concerns on terrorism, India's foreign ministry has said… [+2280 chars]
